{{html:
<link  href='/$$space/.files/css/jquery.contextMenu.css' type='text/css' rel='Stylesheet'/>
<style>
  /* To fix context menu screwed by bootstrap CSS */
  .context-menu-list {
min-width: 120px;
max-width: 120px;

}

.context-menu-item {
  display: block;
  font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
}
</style>
<script type="text/javascript" src="/$$space/.files/js/jquery.ui.position.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="/$$space/.files/js/jquery.contextMenu.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  // Context-menu on buckets list
    $(function(){
        $('#machine_buckets_list > tbody').contextMenu({
            selector: 'tr', 
            callback: function(key, options) {
                var m = "clicked: " + key + " on " + $(this).text();
                window.console && console.log(m) || alert(m); 
            },
            items: {
                "edit": {name: "Edit"},
                "monitoring": {name: "Monitoring"},
                "rename": {name: "Rename"},
                "create snapshot": {name: "Create snapshot"},
                "delete": {name: "Delete"},
                "sep1": "---------",
                "quit": {name: "Quit"}
            }
        });
    });
</script>

<div id="tabbable">
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs">
    <li class="active">
      <a data-toggle="tab" href="#machine_buckets">Machine buckets</a>
    </li>
    <li>
      <a data-toggle="tab" href="#desktop_buckets">Desktop buckets</a>
    </li>
  </ul>
  <div class="tab-content">
    <div id="machine_buckets" class="tab-pane active">
      <h1>Buckets List</h1>
      <a href="/$$space/new_bucket" class="btn btn-info btn-large btnfull">Create Bucket</a>
      <table id="machine_buckets_list"  class="table table-striped table-bordered">
        <tr>
          <th>Image</th>
          <th>Name</th>
          <th>Status</th>
          <th>Plan</th>
          <th>Region</th>
        </tr>
        <tbody data-bind="foreach: buckets" class=" box menu-1">
          <tr>
            <td data-bind="text: imageName"></td>
            <td data-bind="title: name">
              <a data-bind="text: name, attr: {href: bucketUrl}"></a>
            </td>
            <td data-bind="text: status"></td>
            <td data-bind="text: plan"></td>
            <td data-bind="text: region"></td>
          </tr>
        </tbody>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div id="desktop_buckets" class="tab-pane">Coming soon...</div>
  </div>
</div>

}}
